title: Brown Bear Makes a Friend
description: Brown Bear learns about kindness and making new friends in the forest.

pages.text: Brown Bear heard a rustle in the bushes while walking through the forest.
He peeked behind a tree and found a shy rabbit hiding.
'Hello,' said Brown Bear gently, 'Would you like to play?'
Rabbit nodded, but stayed close to the tree.
Brown Bear suggested a game of hide and seek.
Rabbit smiled and agreed to play.
They took turns hiding and finding each other among the trees.
Brown Bear shared his snack with Rabbit, who was very grateful.
Owl flew down and joined the fun, telling a funny story.
Rabbit laughed and felt less shy with each game.
Brown Bear asked Rabbit about his favorite things.
Rabbit shared that he loved carrots and soft grass.
Brown Bear listened carefully and promised to bring carrots next time.
They built a little fort out of sticks and leaves.
Owl helped decorate the fort with feathers and flowers.
The friends played until the sun began to set.
Rabbit thanked Brown Bear for being so kind and patient.
Brown Bear said, 'Making new friends is the best adventure.'
They promised to meet again for more games and stories.
As Rabbit hopped home, he felt happy and brave.
Brown Bear waved goodbye, excited for their next adventure.
The lesson: Kindness and patience help us make new friends and share happy days.
